task.title: Starting a group chat
task.shortdesc: You can start a chat with a group of people from your Contact List.

context.p:
You can start a group chat in one of three ways.
When you are already in a chat with an individual contact, select Invite othersand add others to the chat list. Tap the plus sign next to the name to add to the invitee list. When you clear the Invitees field, you can see the people who are in the list.
Select a contact group, and then tap Start Group Chat in the menu bar. Edit the invitee list, if necessary.
Long press a contact group, and then tap Start Group Chat in the menu bar. Edit the invitee list, if necessary.
Tap Invite to open the chat conversation and send messages to the group.
